amendment.description: Grassley Amendment No. 2898 (to the instructions (to Amendment No. 2886) of the motion to recommit (listed above)), relative to the effective date following enactment of the Act.

action.text: SA 2898 fell when the motion to recommit was withdrawn.

Amendment SA 2898 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 2886. (consideration: CR S2958; text: CR S2958) Grassley Amendment No. 2898 (to the instructions (to Amendment No. 2886) of the motion to recommit (listed above)), relative to the effective date following enactment of the Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2898 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 2886.
